SELECT A.STORE_SEQ AS STORE_SEQ, STORE_NAME, STORE_CATEGORY, STORE_PHONE, STORE_INTRO, STORE_MIN_PRICE, STORE_DELI_TIP, STORE_DELI_TIME, STORE_BSNS_HOURS, STORE_CLOSE_DAY, STORE_ADD_DETAIL1, STORE_ADD_DETAIL2, STORE_ADD_X, STORE_ADD_Y, STORE_LOGO,
STORE_ORIGIN, STORE_OPEN, STORE_DISPLAY, STORE_DESTINATION, ROUND((SQRT(ABS(POWER(X,2)+POWER(Y,2))) * 40075/360)) AS DISTANCE, TRUNC((SELECT AVG(REV_STAR) FROM REVIEW REV WHERE REV.STORE_SEQ = A.STORE_SEQ),1) AS AVERAGE_STARS, (SELECT COUNT(REV_STAR) FROM REVIEW REV WHERE REV.STORE_SEQ = A.STORE_SEQ) AS COUNT_REVIEW FROM (SELECT STORE_SEQ, ABS(STORE_X - MEMBER_X) AS X, ABS(STORE_Y - MEMBER_Y) AS Y FROM (SELECT STORE_SEQ, STORE_ADD_X AS STORE_X, STORE_ADD_Y AS STORE_Y FROM STORE ), (SELECT ADD_X AS MEMBER_X, ADD_Y AS MEMBER_Y, ACC_SEQ, ADD_DIVISION FROM ADDRESS WHERE ACC_SEQ = #{acc_seq} AND ADD_DIVISION = 'basics' ) ) A LEFT JOIN STORE B ON A.STORE_SEQ = B.STORE_SEQ WHERE ABS((X*X*10000)+(Y*Y*10000)) < ( (36000/40075) * (36000/40075) * 2.5 * 2.5) AND( A.STORE_SEQ IN (SELECT M.STORE_SEQ FROM MENU M WHERE M.MENU_NAME LIKE UPPER('%'||#{search, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%') OR M.MENU_NAME LIKE LOWER('%'||#{search, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%')) OR A.STORE_SEQ IN (SELECT SEC_STORE.STORE_SEQ FROM STORE SEC_STORE WHERE SEC_STORE.STORE_NAME LIKE UPPER('%'||#{search, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%') OR SEC_STORE.STORE_NAME LIKE LOWER('%'||#{search, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%') OR SEC_STORE.STORE_CATEGORY LIKE UPPER('%'||#{search, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%') OR SEC_STORE.STORE_CATEGORY LIKE LOWER('%'||#{search, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%')) )
